Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This is the based UI delegate for a Diagram component.

void refreshFigure ( Figure figure ) [inline]
 

Refresh a Figure by using the decorated area recommended by the renderer that paints that figure. this either damages or repaints depending on wether or not fast refresh is enabled.

Parameters:
Figure  
Parameters:
